news_header: Three stocks with strong growth characteristics and buy ranks for investors to consider.
news_original_title: Best Growth Stocks to Buy for January 30th
news_text: On January 30, three stocks are highlighted for investors: KT Corporation, Life Time Group Holdings, and Twilio Inc. All three carry a Zacks Rank #1 and have seen positive adjustments in their earnings estimates over the past 60 days. KT Corporation has a PEG ratio of 0.36, Life Time Group Holdings has a PEG ratio of 0.62, and Twilio has a PEG ratio of 1.17. Each company possesses a strong Growth Score, with Twilio achieving an A. These stocks are considered under the radar, presenting a good investment opportunity.
